25 
26 #ifndef REACTPHYSICS3D_MATERIAL_H
27 #define REACTPHYSICS3D_MATERIAL_H
28 
29 // Libraries
30 #include <cassert>
31 #include <cmath>
32 #include <reactphysics3d/configuration.h>
33 
34 namespace reactphysics3d {
35 
36 // Class Material
42 class Material {
43 
44  private :
45 
46  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
47 
49  decimal mFrictionCoefficientSqrt;
50 
52  decimal mBounciness;
53 
55  decimal mMassDensity;
56 
57  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
58 
60  Material(decimal frictionCoefficient, decimal bounciness, decimal massDensity = decimal(1.0));
61 
62  public :
63 
64  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
65 
67  decimal getBounciness() const;
68 
70  void setBounciness(decimal bounciness);
71 
73  decimal getFrictionCoefficient() const;
74 
76  void setFrictionCoefficient(decimal frictionCoefficient);
77 
79  decimal getFrictionCoefficientSqrt() const;
80 
82  decimal getMassDensity() const;
83 
85  void setMassDensity(decimal massDensity);
86 
88  std::string to_string() const;
89 
90  // ---------- Friendship ---------- //
91 
92  friend class Collider;
93  friend class CollisionBody;
94  friend class RigidBody;
95 };
96 
97 // Return the bounciness
101 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal Material::getBounciness() const {
102  return mBounciness;
103 }
104 
105 // Set the bounciness.
108 
111 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void Material::setBounciness(decimal bounciness) {
112  assert(bounciness >= decimal(0.0) && bounciness <= decimal(1.0));
113  mBounciness = bounciness;
114 }
115 
116 // Return the friction coefficient
120 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal Material::getFrictionCoefficient() const {
121  return mFrictionCoefficientSqrt * mFrictionCoefficientSqrt;
122 }
123 
124 // Set the friction coefficient.
127 
130 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void Material::setFrictionCoefficient(decimal frictionCoefficient) {
131  assert(frictionCoefficient >= decimal(0.0));
132  mFrictionCoefficientSqrt = std::sqrt(frictionCoefficient);
133 }
134 
135 // Return the square root friction coefficient
136 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal Material::getFrictionCoefficientSqrt() const {
137  return mFrictionCoefficientSqrt;
138 }
139 
140 // Return the mass density of the collider
141 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal Material::getMassDensity() const {
142  return mMassDensity;
143 }
144 
145 // Set the mass density of the collider
149 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void Material::setMassDensity(decimal massDensity) {
150  mMassDensity = massDensity;
151 }
152 
153 // Return a string representation for the material
154 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE std::string Material::to_string() const {
155 
156  std::stringstream ss;
157 
158  ss << "frictionCoefficient=" << (mFrictionCoefficientSqrt * mFrictionCoefficientSqrt) << std::endl;
159  ss << "bounciness=" << mBounciness << std::endl;
160 
161  return ss.str();
162 }
163 
164 }
165 
166 #endif
